attributes.action: As a travel agent explain what data you’re using to determine the green list
attributes.additional_details: Stick to the guidelines they issued 7 days notice and also if it not safe to travel stop all activities which include close contact which also includes UK holidays as if safer to travel on a plane wearing a mask than attend a football stadium with 10k 0plus supporters not wearing masks properly and singing in close proximity to others. The government data and guidelines don’t add up
attributes.background: Show the data and explain in news conferences what and how they are determining the green list
